import{configureStore,createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";//받아오는 데이터//
var initialState={userLoading:false,userData:null,error:null};var userSlice=createSlice({name:"users",initialState:initialState,reducers:{// Login
loginRequest:function loginRequest(state,_action){state.userLoading=true;state.error=null;},loginSuccess:function loginSuccess(state,action){state.userLoading=false;state.userData=action.payload;},loginFailure:function loginFailure(state,action){state.userLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;},//join
joinRequest:function joinRequest(state,action){state.userLoading=true;state.error=null;},joinSuccess:function joinSuccess(state,action){state.userLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;},joinFailure:function joinFailure(state,action){state.userLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;},//modify
modifyRequest:function modifyRequest(state,action){state.userLoading=true;state.error=null;},modifySuccess:function modifySuccess(state,action){state.userLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;},modifyFailure:function modifyFailure(state,action){state.userLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;},//exist
existRequest:function existRequest(state,action){state.userLoading=true;state.error=null;},existSuccess:function existSuccess(state,action){state.userLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;},existFailure:function existFailure(state,action){state.userLoading=true;state.error=null;}}});var store=configureStore({reducer:{user:userSlice.reducer}});var reducer=userSlice.reducer,actions=userSlice.actions;var modifyRequest=actions.modifyRequest,modifyFailure=actions.modifyFailure,modifySuccess=actions.modifySuccess,existFailure=actions.existFailure,existRequest=actions.existRequest,existSuccess=actions.existSuccess,loginRequest=actions.loginRequest,loginSuccess=actions.loginSuccess,loginFailure=actions.loginFailure,joinFailure=actions.joinFailure,joinRequest=actions.joinRequest,joinSuccess=actions.joinSuccess;export{modifyRequest,modifyFailure,modifySuccess,existFailure,existRequest,existSuccess,loginRequest,loginSuccess,loginFailure,joinFailure,joinRequest,joinSuccess};export default reducer;
